definition: variant of 櫃檯|柜台[gui4 tai2]
sales counter/front desk/bar/(of markets, medicines etc) OTC (over-the-counter)
variant of 櫃檯|柜台[gui4 tai2]

pinyin: deng1 ji1 shou3 xu4 gui4 tai2
Zheng4 quan4 Gui4 tai2 Mai3 mai4 Zhong1 xin1

sentences.english: She puts a big bundle of dirty clothes on the counter.
sentences.chinese: 她把一大捆脏衣服扔到柜台上。

sentences.english: Wang Lifa is sitting on a high stool behind the counter.
sentences.chinese: 王利发高高地坐在柜台里。

sentences.english: Excuse me, can you show me the cloisonné bracelet in the counter?
sentences.chinese: 劳驾，你能把柜台里的那个景泰蓝手镯给我看看吗？

sentences.english: A glass cabinet holds a horse saddle encrusted in gems.
sentences.chinese: 一个玻璃柜台放着外表镶嵌着宝石的马鞍。

sentences.english: He was led to the exclusive counter by the staff of the shop.
sentences.chinese: 他被商店的职员领到了专门出售高档商品的柜台。

sentences.english: Tell the man behind the counter what you want.
sentences.chinese: 你要什么就告知柜台后面的男服务员。

sentences.english: She riffed through the items on the counter.
sentences.chinese: 她迅速地浏览了一遍柜台上的货品。

sentences.english: Someone hefted the register back up to its place on the counter.
sentences.chinese: 有人拿起收银机，把它放回柜台原来的位置上。

sentences.english: When I got there she smiled again, and handed me a boarding pass.
sentences.chinese: 在柜台前她笑容满面地递给我一张登机牌。

sentences.english: The poor wicker husband went behind the bar, and poured himself a drink.
sentences.chinese: 可怜的柳条丈夫只好走到柜台后面给自己倒了杯酒。

sentences.english: I plopped a $20 bill on the counter.
sentences.chinese: 我把一张20美元的钞票甩在柜台上。

sentences.english: These cards allow you to tap readers at gas stations pumps or check-out counters.
sentences.chinese: 人们可以用这种信用卡在加油站或者柜台刷卡结帐。

sentences.english: Excuse me, Is this the check-in counter for NW157?
sentences.chinese: 劳驾，这是西北航空公司157班机办手续的柜台吗？

sentences.english: Woodware and wood carvings are in the counter on the left.
sentences.chinese: 木器和木雕在左边的柜台。

sentences.english: An old man at the counter nodded in greeting when he saw Walter.
sentences.chinese: 柜台后面有一个老头看见瓦尔特进来向他点头致意。

sentences.english: Get your invation card at church's counter and invite your friend.
sentences.chinese: 在教会柜台索取你的邀请卡并邀请你的朋友。

definition: customer area of a store/showroom/dining area of a restaurant
stage/proscenium/foreground in politics etc (sometimes derog.)/front desk/reception desk/(computing) front-end/foreground
to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結帳|结帐
to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結賬|结账
